name: Catch Off-Guard

sections.text: You do not suffer any penalties for using an improvised melee weapon. Unarmed opponents are flat-footed against any attacks you make with an improvised melee weapon.
sections.name: Benefits

sections.text: You take a –4 penalty on attack rolls made with an improvised weapon.
sections.name: Normal

description: Foes are surprised by your skilled use of unorthodox and improvised weapons.
